K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:133b-1: a'arya tri ska ndha ka n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:133b-3: 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:133b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:133b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:133b-7: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbye dgon pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-0: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes @134a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-1: chen pos legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo mnga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-3: chos kyi sku gnyis su med pa la brten cing gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-4: nam mkha'i dkyil yul du gyur cing thug pa med pa'i ye shes mnga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-5: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-6: chos kyi cod pa na chags pa med pa mchog dam pa dri ma med pas bcings pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-7: so so yang dag par rig pa chen po rjes su bsgrags pas shin tu rnam par dbye ba'i dbyangs can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-8: bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yangs shing 'od gsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-9: nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos thugs su chud pas mi rten par gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-10: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du shin tu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi sku dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-11: bskal pa bye ba dpag tu med par yon tan gyi chos yongs su brjod kyang mi zad cing thug pa med pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa bstan pa'i khyad par brnyes pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad snyed kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa phun sum tshogs pa las brtsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-0: bskal pa mtha' yas pa bsngags pa brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs @134b pa de'i tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang mi zad cing thug pa ma mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la'ang thug pa ma mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-2: de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims dpag tu ma mchis pa de dag la mos pa'i mchog gis mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-10: bla na ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-11: mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-12: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-13: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-14: snang ba ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-16: zil gyis mi non pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-17: yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-18: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i mos pas lhag par mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-19: tshul khrims la ji lta ba de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-22: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-23: de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-29: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i bar dag la lhag par mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:134b-30: mos nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135a-8: byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135a-9: byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135a-10: byams pa'i yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135a-12: sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi lus kyi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135a-14: yid kyi las kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135a-25: dmigs pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135a-44: yo byad thams cad bkod pa rnam par dag pa rgya chen po 'di dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsti stang du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135a-49: mchod pa mos pa'i stobs las nges par byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135a-50: khams gsum pa las shin tu 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-0: nyon @135b mongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos las byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-1: mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-2: ye shes sgyu ma las shin tu yongs su grub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-3: las sgyu ma las shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-4: gnas thams cad las shin tu spangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-5: 'jig rten sgyu ma las byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-6: ngo bo nyid kyi chos dang 'brel pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsti stang du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-13: gong du'ang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsab par 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-14: sems can gyi rgyud yongs su smin par bgyid par 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-15: zhing gi rgyud rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-16: las kyi rgyud dang mi 'gal bar 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-17: chos kyi rgyud rab tu rnam par 'byed par 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-18: dus gsum gyi rgyud yongs su rtogs par 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-19: phyogs kyi rgyud la rab tu 'jug par 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-20: 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i rgyud la rab tu 'god par 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-21: mos pa'i rgyud rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-22: dbang po'i rgyud la lta bar 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:135b-23: chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo la rnam par 'phrul par 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-0: 'gro ba'i 'khor lo thams cad bsdu bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis sangs @136a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-1: rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod par bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal ba'i mchod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rab 'byams las nges par byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-4: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma gnas pa'i yul gyi rjes su zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-6: rim gro bgyi ba gtsug gi bla ma zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-10: ma skyes pa'i chos las byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rigs btsun par skyes pa'i ye shes kyi mig gis rig pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136a-12: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa ming gis khyab pa mang po dag na chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-0: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa chos kyi dbyings su gtogs @136b pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-1: de bas gong du'ang mchod pa yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i shugs kyis bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-3: rdo rje'i dbang po snang bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-4: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad du snang ba'i me tog gi rgyal po'i ye shes las byung ba'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bci snang [?] du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-10: ji ltar bdag gi don du mchod pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-11: sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-12: de ltar bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i stobs kyis brlan pa'i sems bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-14: snying rje chen pos nye bar bsten pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-15: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i smon lam dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod kyi rjes su zhugs par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-17: thabs kyi stobs chen pos yongs su bzung bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:136b-19: yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das par gyur nas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las thams cad bshags par bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-0: gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' ma @137a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-2: gang sems can dam pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-3: gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-4: gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-5: gang 'phags pa rnams kyis bshung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-6: gang mkhas pa rnams dang zhe 'gras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-7: gang rig pa rnams kyis bor ba 'dod chags dang; zhe sdang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-8: gti mug gis rab tu gzir ba'i dbang gis byung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-11: 'khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang gis byung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-14: mya ngan gyi dbang gis byung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-17: mngon par zhen pa'i stobs kyis byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-24: rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-25: chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-27: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i sgrib pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-28: theg pa chen po'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-29: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad pa gsog pa la gnod pa'i sgrib pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-30: sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'dre ba'i sgrib pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137a-31: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la sgrib pa dang chod pa'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-0: sgrib @137b pa'i las bgyis shing bsags pa sgrib pa'i kun nas ldang ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-1: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-2: yi dvags kyi yul du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-3: lha dbul por skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-4: sangs rgyas la lta ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-5: chos mnyan pa yongs su mi len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-8: dge 'dun dkon mchog mngon par mi rig par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-9: byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa mi 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pas yongs su bzung ba mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba chab 'tshal ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-12: byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam mi nyan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-14: bdud sdig can rnams kyis 'joms par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos thag ring du bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa'i sbyor ba las rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-17: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 'khu bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-18: bsam pa yongs su dag pa mi thob pa dang; dran pa brjed pa ma mchis pa mi 'thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-19: chos la lta ba mi 'thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:137b-20: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa la mi mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yid @138a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-2: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo khong du mi chud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-3: sa nas sar gnas pa mi 'thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-4: byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa mi 'thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-5: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i las byas pa dang ldan pa khong du mi chud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-6: smon lam chen po las nur bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-7: spyod pa yongs su dag pa mi 'thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-8: gzungs kyi rgyan gyi snang ba mi 'thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-9: spobs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba khong du mi chud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-10: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam la yongs su 'dris par bgyi ba khong du mi chud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-11: chos mnyam pa nyid mi rtogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-12: bsod nams mnyam pa nyid mi skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-13: ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du mi chud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-14: 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyis kun tu gzhom par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa de lta bu la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang; yon tan gyi chos thams cad kun tu sgrub pa la mi phyogs par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa'i 'gebs pa grangs ma mchis pa 'bum phrag bcu po de dag dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su 'dus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-16: ye shes gzigs pa sgrib pa mi mnga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138a-17: chags pa ma mchis pa'i mig gi yul brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138b-0: mnyam pa @138b nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138b-1: chos kyi dbyings mun pa ma mchis par zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag mngon sum du gyur par mos nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul tshad med par brtags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138b-2: skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa'i khyon tsam re re la de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad snyed du lhag par mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138b-3: skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig bzhag pa'i khyon la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad snyed du lhag par mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang lus thob pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems snyed kyis zhabs kyi 'og tu gtugs te phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138b-5: lus thob pa re re la'ang mgo dag gi lam nges pa'i tshig snyed du lhag par mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138b-6: mgo re re la'ang kha'i sgo zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab tu dbye ba snyed du lhag par mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138b-7: kha'i sgo re re la'ang lce'i rtse mo zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab tu dbye ba snyed du lhag par mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:138b-8: lce'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor re re la'ang nges pa'i tshig gi sgrar brtags pa'i tha snyad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:139a-0: 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi spyod pa dang mnyam pas sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor dang mthun par gyur nas lhag pa'i @139a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:139a-1: bsam pa nyon mongs pa'i ri chen po rnam par 'thor pa las byung ba'i sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las de dag 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:139a-3: 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i bshags pas 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:139a-9: las la dbang pas dbang bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:139a-10: stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa rnams kyi bde ba nye bar bstan pa'i slad du yongs su bsngo'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:144b-5: steng g-yogs med pa'i rgyud kyi phyogs yongs su rje bar bshad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:144b-6: 'chol ba'i rgyud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par sgrub pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:155b-18: des pus mo g-yon pa'i lha nga sa la 'dzugs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-0: sems can gang su dag g-yon phyogs kyi lam la gnas pa de dag @156a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-1: thams cad 'phags pa'i lam la gnas shing yang dag pa'i lam la gnas par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-2: des lag pa g-yas pa sa la 'jugs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-4: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la bzhugs pa dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pas dbu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-6: skyil mo krung la yongs su byugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-7: phyag g-yas pa sa la bsnun nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-8: bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-9: byang chub brnyes pa de bzhin du sems can 'di dag gis kyang bdud phyir rgol ba choms par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-10: byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing sa chen po la bsnun nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-11: des lag pa g-yon pa sa la 'dzugs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-13: sems can gang su dag byis pa'i chos la gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-14: g-yon phyogs su 'dzin pa la gdul dka' ba de dag thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis shin tu sdud par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-16: dpral ba sa la gtugs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-18: sems can thams cad nga rgyal ma mchis pa 'dis bla ma rnams la rim gro bgyid pa rnyed cing spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156a-19: dge ba'i chos thams cad 'phags par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-0: da @156b ltar bdag yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-1: dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-2: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su shes par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-3: mngon par shes pa nyams pa med pa lnga thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-4: mig lnga yongs su dag par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-5: sems can 'gro ba lngar skyes pa rnams 'gro ba lnga las khyad par du 'phags par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-6: tshul khrims khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-7: ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-8: shes rab khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-9: rnam par grol ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-10: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba khyad par du 'phags par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-11: des yan lag lnga yongs su dag pa dang sgrib pa lnga dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-12: stobs lnga la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed pa dang ma bral bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-21: ye shes chags pa mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-22: ma byon ma bzhud pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-23: thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:156b-24: bdag gis 'khor ba thog ma'i mtha'i mu nas bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-2: bdag gi mtha' ma 'tshal bas chos ma lags pa la chos su 'du shes bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-3: 'dul ba ma lags pa la 'dul bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-4: sbyin gnas ma lags pa la sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-5: mi dge ba la dge bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-6: phyin ci log gi sems kyis bdag gi lus su lta bas yongs su dkris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-7: dge ba'i chos gang sangs rgyas kyis bka' ma stsal pa mngon par 'dus bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-9: bgyid du stsal ba dang; bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa gang ci mchis pa de bdag 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-11: bdag gis sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du 'du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-12: sems sgyu ma lta bur ma 'tshal nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang lags pa de thams cad 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-13: bdag gis mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis par ma 'tshal nas lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-15: yid kyis chos dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-16: mi dge ba mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157a-17: mngon par 'dus bgyis pa gang lags pa de 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-0: shes rab mnyam @157b pa nyid du ma 'tshal nas dmigs par lhung bas sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-1: tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pas tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-3: gzhan du 'du shes pas bzod pa bsgoms pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-5: sems la gnas te brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-7: dmigs pa la gnas te bsam gtan bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-9: rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par dga' bas shes rab rnam par dpyad pa gang lags pa de 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-10: bdag gis don dam pa'i mchod pa ma 'tshal nas gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-12: mtshan la mngon par zhen pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa bgyis pa gang lags pa de 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-13: bdag chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i ye shes la ma zhugs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-14: chos tha dad pa la gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-17: rab tu bsams par gyur pa gang lags pa de 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-18: bdag gis chos 'dus ma byas su ma 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-19: dge 'dun la mang por 'du shes nas dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa gang lags pa de 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-20: bdag gis dgon pa ma 'tshal nas dgon pa'i gnas bsnyen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:157b-21: 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang lags pa de 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-0: bdag gis chos nyid gnas par ma 'tshal nas 'byung ba @158a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-2: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan blang bar zhugs pa gang lags pa de 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-3: bdag gis chos kyi dbyings yongs su gzung ba ma mchis par ma 'tshal ma zhugs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-4: sems can bsdu bar 'tshal ba'i bsdu bas sems can dag bsdus pa gang lags pa de 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-5: bdag gis byang chub kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin ma 'tshal nas lta ba la yongs su zhen pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgoms pa gang lags pa de 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-6: bdag gis dge sbyong gi lam zhi ba ma 'tshal nas rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-7: dge slong gi dngos po bskyed pa gang lags pa de 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-8: kun rdzob la 'jug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan gang dag bsags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis 'dus byas kyi bde bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-10: 'dus ma byas las shin tu ring bar gyur pa gang lags pa de dag 'chags so zhes brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-12: de ltar thog mar byang chub sems dpas bag la nyal dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-13: mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-14: mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-16: spros pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-17: len pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158a-18: gnas pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-0: rten pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa'i chos thams cad bshags @158b par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-1: 'di la 'di lta bu'i bsdu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-3: bcos pa kun tu mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sdig pa bshags pa yongs su dag pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-7: byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-11: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-12: rnams kyis dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang ldan pa rnams kyi bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci'ang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-14: sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-15: rtsa ba ma mchis shing rten ma mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-16: gtong ba ma mchis pas gtong ba rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-17: rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims mi zad mi skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-18: sems can ma mchis pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-19: dmigs pa las dben pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-20: sems kyi ngo bo nyid la nges par sems pa'i bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-22: pha rol gyi mthar lta ba rnam par spangs pa'i shes rab rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-23: stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-24: rnam pa'i rnam pa ma mchis pa'i snying rje dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:158b-25: chos la kun tu mi 'byung ba'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-0: yal bar 'dor ba ma lags pa'i btang snyoms gang lags pa de dag la rjes su yi @159a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-2: khyim gyi dngos po thams cad bzung ba ma mchis shing gang yongs su ma bzung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-3: rtsa ba ma mchis shing rten pa ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma dran pa dran par gyur pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag par rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-5: ma skyes pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-9: 'dun pa dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-10: dbang po lnga mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i dbang po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-11: nam mkha' ltar mi thul ba'i stobs rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-12: don dam pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-13: mi gnyis pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-14: zhi ba'i zhi gnas thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-16: rnam par grol ba dang mthun pa'i lhag mthong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-17: mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon du 'gro ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-18: thog ma'i mtha' nas lus kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-19: brjod du ma mchis pa'i ngag rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-20: sangs rgyas la rim gro bgyi ba bsnyen bkur bgyis pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-21: chos la rim gro bgyi ba chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159a-22: dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba tshogs pa ma mchis shing yon tan ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-0: spyod lam @159b thams cad rnam par ma brtags pa'i sdom pa spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-3: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar gyur pa de dag gi chos spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-5: bdud thams cad kyis mi shigs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-6: 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-8: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sar ma des pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang mthun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba bzang po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-11: las dkar po ma lags pa 'gag par 'gyur ba gzhan gang ci mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba bzang po 'od gsal ba'i las gang gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-14: 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-17: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub brnyes pa de dag gi tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-21: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zag pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-22: stobs mi thul ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-23: mi 'jigs pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang; sangs rgyas kyi chos chags pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-24: kun tu mi 'byung ba'i byams pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:159b-25: snying rje chen po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-1: mi mthong ba nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang lags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-2: gnyis su ma mchis pa'i bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-4: sems kyi rgyud bcos ma ma lags pa nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-6: tshangs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-7: brjod pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-8: sems can thams cad la shes pa snang ba rnam par shes pa las gzhan ma lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-9: sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i slad du thabs mkhas pa'i gnas la gnas pa dag 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-11: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-12: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-13: dam pa'i chos nub kyi bar du de dag la mchod pa bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-14: bgyid pa dang; bgyid par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa sems can thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-16: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160a-17: chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-0: chos kyi @160b rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-1: log pa brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa'i brgyad pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-2: chags pa med pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i rigs kyis pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-3: rgyun du zhugs pa rgyun las bzlog ste zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-4: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba gang du'ang mi 'gro ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-5: phyir mi 'ong ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas der gnas par 'gyur ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-6: dgra bcom pa grangs ma mchis shing skye ba ma mchis par rab tu phye ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-7: rang sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo khong du chud pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-8: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mngon sum du rtogs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-10: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ba'i chos las 'das shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-12: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-13: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rten pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:160b-14: 'dus byas las yongs su brgal ba de dag thams cad las rjes su yi rang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161a-1: dang; da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161a-2: tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161a-13: mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161a-15: mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs la mkhas pa zung du 'brel ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161a-21: shin tu spyod pa spyad pa rab tu mkhyen pas mkhyen pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon sum du mdzad nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161a-22: rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161b-0: chos @161b nyid des rjes su slob pa de bzhin du bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis pa rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161b-15: chos thams cad ma dmigs nas bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161b-16: brjod du med pa'i chos skyon ma mchis pa brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161b-19: skad thams cad dang bral ba /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:161b-22: sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du thugs rje chen po chud ma gzan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-2: byang chub kyi shing la gzigs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-10: lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-11: dgyes shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-14: chos kyis 'khor lo mi 'jug pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-15: mngon par mi 'grub pa'i 'khor lo dang; tshu rol dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-16: pha rol yongs su gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-17: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-18: bdud phyir rgol ba choms pa'i 'khor lo bskor du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-19: brjod du ma mchis pa'i rnga brdung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-20: sgra ma mchis pa'i dung bud du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-21: chos shes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-25: rnam par grol ba'i sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-26: thugs rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162a-27: chos chen po'i chu'i char ba'i rgyun gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog rnam par spel du gsol /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-0: 'di ni @162b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bskul ba'i phung po kha na ma tho ba med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-3: byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-4: tshig 'di skad ces; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag shin tu mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-5: legs par bgyis pa'i chos kyi rgyun mi gcod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu lung bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-7: dge 'dun 'phags pa rab tu gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-8: gdul ba'i sems can dag shin tu btul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-9: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba tshol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-10: chos gzung ba 'dzin par mdzad pa'i slad du yongs su mi skyo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-11: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i tshul gyis ji ltar de dag mi skye ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-12: ma skyes pa de bzhin du ma 'gags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-14: 'gag par mi 'gyur bar bzhugs su gsol lo zhes brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-16: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsol ba 'debs pa yod pa ma yin pa len pa med pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-19: byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-21: ma mchis bzhin du bdag gis mgos phyag bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:162b-23: rjes su yi rang ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163a-4: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163a-6: gsol ba 'debs pa de'ang ma mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163a-11: rjes su yi rang ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163a-16: de bzhin du byang chub kyang len pa ma mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163a-22: mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163a-24: mi dma' ba'i yongs su bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs par yongs su bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163a-29: gzugs las kyang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163a-30: byung nas kyang zhig cing med de mi gnas so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-4: de'ang yid las kyang ma byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-5: chos las kyang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-6: de ni byung nas zhig cing med de mi gnas so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-8: byang chub kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la mi 'jug mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-9: 'on kyang byang chub kyi rgyu rkyen gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-11: skyes nas zhig cing med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-12: de la sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-13: sems gang gis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag phan tshun du 'brel bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-16: me ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-17: byung nas kyang zhig cing med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:163b-18: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi me'ang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:164a-0: bzod pa snang ba'i ye shes thob pa rnams par 'byed pa rnams kyi blo rnams par mi dpyod @164a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:164a-1: pa gang yin pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du byas te yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:164a-2: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bshad pa de bzhin du thams cad mkhas pa'i ye shes des yongs su bsngo'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-019:164a-11: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
